author: nicko
msg: Updated doc comments. I have not been able to confirm the stuff on win32 file locking and sharing modes

author: nicko
msg: Amended the IAppenderAttachable interface to make the behaviour regarding closing the appenders more explicit. Updated the RemoveAppender methods to return the appender removed.

author: nicko
msg: Added AnsiColorTerminalAppender contributed by Patrick Wagstrom.

This appender uses ANSI Color escape sequences to colorizes log messages. Different foreground and background colors as well as attributes like Bright and Underline can be specified for different levels.

author: nicko
msg: Added ExceptionPatternConverter. Updated PatternLayout to check converters for IgnoresException.
